com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase
Interface HBaseClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
BoundedHBaseClient, HBaseClientProxy, InstrumentedHBaseClient
public interface HBaseClient

Client for interacting with an HBase cluster. To create an instance, use HBaseClientFactory. All implementations are wrapper proxies around HBaseClient providing additional functionality.

See Also:
HBaseClientFactory, HBaseClient

Atomically creates a cell if, and only if, it doesn't already exist.

Parameters:

Returns:

Returns:
